definitions.body: should include Jos 12:18, 1Sa 4:1, 1Sa 29:1, and 2Ki 13:22: LXXL; town not near Jezreel, but at N. end of philistine plain; cf. LXXL:i. c. We:Comp.254 Dr:1 S 1Sa 29:11 RS:OTJC 2.435 GASm:Geogr. 400 f. Buhl:Geogr. 212 (and N.) Bu:RS 235 f.; more doubtful are 1Ki 20:26, 1Ki 20:30, 2Ki 13:17 (Kit 1Ki 20:26); these, with Jos 19:30, Ju Jdg 1:31, might denote an Apheḳ near Jezreel.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — 1. 8 from below: Job 12:21 rd. perh. [[אַבִּירִים]] Du (v. also Bu).
